concept.title: Stack
concept.shortdesc: A decentralized, automated content pipeline for building and deploying this static HTML5 website using the latest DITA 2.0 standard and the DITA Open Toolkit.

ul.li: Standard OASIS DITA 2.0 maps and topics are used for content development and defining navigation.
GitHub Actions orchestrate the build processes.
The latest stable version of the DITA Open Toolkit is auto-deployed and generates generic HTML5 output.
Python applies additional configuration, including responsive CSS styling.
URI availability is served through Fleek's gateway.
The resulting content is stored and pinned on IPFS.
